document.full_text: a former galleon group trader contends he saw a brother of accused hedge fund founder raj rajaratnam remove notebooks from their office on the day of rajaratnam's october 2009 arrest, according to trial documents.
document.title: rajaratnam brother removed galleon records: filings
lines_and_colors: a former galleon group trader contends he saw a brother of accused hedge fund founder raj rajaratnam remove notebooks from their office on the day of rajaratnam's october 2009 arrest, according to trial documents.
